title: Skin idea "Pizza pizza delivery sivir"
body:
The skin is quite simple it would sivir wearing a traditional chefs outfit as shown and she throws pizza at the enemy's

"Q "Throws a full pizza at the enemy
"W"  Throws pizza slices at the enemy
"E" creates a pizza shield
"R" remains the same

If you have any other ideas feel free to say so

replies.body: this idea was at pax a long time ago
